column4: how can something as simple as moderation be impossible? it's not really an on-topic discussion..
moderation .. can u moderate society .. or information .. its impossible ..
this is Ubuntu, not the whole of human society or any other portion thereof.
are u prepared to talk to me ,, please
respect of borders is crucial in such terms. please, #ubuntu-ops is the place to discuss this.
that's a bit misleading - it's only as secure as the user makes it.
oh .. how can is that .. is it possible to enter linux systems with no authoriztion
not by default.
we don't discuss such things here.
is it a secret
it would be off-topic to discuss it here.
why .. do you know how to hack into a linux system
you sound  like a bitch
please, take your negative attitude and go elsewhere.
said that linux system is only as secure as you make it .. so
yeah, and then you kept pestering me and then resorted to name-calling.
that's like saying that windows will always crash within 5 minutes of being booted up on every computer in the world.
no .. windows can crash on you on some occasions .. but its impossible to hack into linux system .. unless you can tell me how its done
again, that subject is offtopic, so please stop asking.
what was that !ops | Martiini .. you complained all admins about em now .. is that not bitchlike bahavior ...
please don't use that sort of language in here.
perhaps if you'd show some respect, you wouldn't have this problem.
you can shove respect in your ass
